content.text:
# 31st Forqué Awards

The 31st Forqué Awards ceremony, presented by  will take place at the IFEMA Palacio Municipal in Madrid on 13 December 2025.
Background
The nominations were announced on 5 November 2025. Later in the month, producer  was announced as the recipient of the EGEDA Gold Medal.
